topic.title: Zeronet mail questions?
topic.body:
Hi I have some questions for zeronet mail ?
First Question is what encryption use zeronet mail ?
Second Question is witch programing language is writen the code witch use this mail service ?

topic.title: Database encryption
topic.body: Hi please add option to encrypt all database of downloaded web site with random aes 256 bit key and random salt for every diferent web site.

topic.title: Integrate Zeronet in Tails Os
topic.body:
Hi please integrate Zeronet in Tails Os . Tails is Debian based Os . Tails is anonymous Os witch use tor network .
All system loaded in ram memory .
Official web site 
https://tails.boum.org
Please contact with Tails Dev team 
 tails@boum.org
It will be cool to see Zeronet in Tails OS .

topic.title: Zeronet audit
topic.body: We must make security audit of zeronet source code.

topic.title: Opsec for hackers
topic.body:
1 Create new persona(cover )
2 Work on the legend (history, background, 
supporting evidence for the persona)
3 Create sub-aliases

4Never reveal your operational 
details
5 Never reveal your plans 
6Never trust anyone
7 Never operate from your house 
8Keep personal life and hacking 
separated
9  Donâ€™t attract attention
10 Always use Tails Os 
Source http://grugq.github.io/presentations/Keynote_The_Grugq_-_OPSEC_for_Russians.pdf

1_1NibKcCcidCHue94Rhr7F4Gvu3Lg6FAESp.body:
Thanks . How long message are keept in the p2p network?
Is this posible to use this service under Tor ?
Please add in future versions PGP support.

4_1NibKcCcidCHue94Rhr7F4Gvu3Lg6FAESp.body:
We must find a team of good programers. 
We have 2 options 
Fist to pay to someone to make security audit of zeronet source code .
Second to find people voluntary to make security audit on zeronet source code of every new version of this protocol.
